title: Full title: “Hopes, worries and expectations” experiences of pregnancy with inflammatory bowel disease: An interpretative phenomenological analysis study
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Rebecca Homer-Perry, Wladyslawa Czuber-Dochan, Tiffany Wade, Satvinder Purewal, Sarah CE. Chapman, Matthew Brookes, Christian P. Selinger, Helen Steed
